page.title: 15A NURSERY IN WITHYHAM/ST.JN.
page.content: My mother and father own and run a small{nursery}for growing{plants.}They grow alpine plants for putting in rockeries and small flower beds and they also grow dwarf conifers. They started the nursery in 1973 before I was born, in Mayfield, but it grew so much that they had to move some of the plnts to our home in Crowborough. The plants are propagated during the spring and summer from{cuttings}and seed. They start growing in seed trays on a warm bed and when the baby plants are large enough to handle they are poted intp small pots and sold.
